page.title: 14PARISH COUNCIL IN MAWNAN
page.content: Meetings are held monthly.There are 10 Parish{Councillors}elected every 4 years.Four are Farmers.Three people have moved in the last 15 years most of the people are local.The Council looks after fields,foot paths and playing fields.They also pass opinions on planning applications.Recently they have been concerned about rebuilding Durgan steps which have been eroded by the sea.They are concerned about redecorating the Cricket Pavillion and fitting a Fire Extinguisher.It was suggested that a new pavillion should be built.The state of grass by the school and play area is too long and needs cutting more regularly than once a year.It was suggested that the chip van parked in a dangerous position in the village centre and should move to the hall.
